p: The present study had three purposes: (a) develop new nuclear SSR markers for A. artemisiifolia following three different approaches (whole-genome enrichment followed by 454 sequencing, whole-genome Illumina sequencing, and use of existing EST databases), (b) investigate the genetic diversity, population structure and mating system of A. artemisiifolia using populations sampled in North America and Europe, and (c) assess marker transferability to A. trifida, A. psilostachya and A. tenuifolia.
